channel.title: Changing Items that certain NPC's drop
channel.description:
I was wondering how I could change/add what items cacn be dropped after killing certain NPC's. and how often a certain NPC would drop a certain item.
Thanks. :D

item.title: Changing Items that certain NPC's drop
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Yes you can go to config file, Npcdrop.cfg and then ctrl+f npc id copy the line that it says that click the end of the line hit enter on your keyboard paste and then number after NPC id will be item id and then how many and then drop rate % 3 is a good % if you want it little bit faster I would put at 4% 10% is like 100%…

Example:

npcdrop = 2263 5509 1 10
l l l l
Npc id l l l
l l l
Item ID l l
How many l
Procent

Read full topic
